text:
[Verse]
Golden sky light fades
In the warm night's embrace
Dreams of endless days
Here we find our place

[Verse 2]
Stars begin to glow
Whispers in the breeze
Softly secrets flow
Time's gentle ease

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams tonight
Holding on so tight
Hearts shining bright
In the fading light

[Bridge]
Moon above so high
Guides the wandering souls
As the night draws nigh
Love's story unfolds

[Verse 3]
Moments soft and true
In the twilight's hue
Every wish feels new
Under skies so blue

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams tonight
Holding on so tight
Hearts shining bright
In the fading light
title: Sunset Dreams
